Package src.Controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
src.Controller.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
This class serves as the controller for the login functionality of the application. It handles the interaction between the LoginViewerGUI view and the UserDatabase model, as well as the calculation and manipulation of user profiles and their associated macronutrient values.

    • checkIfRegistered

      public boolean checkIfRegistered(String email)
      Checks if the given email is registered in the user database.
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check for registration.
      Returns:
      true if the email is registered, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a SQLException occurs.

    • validateLogin

      public boolean validateLogin(String email, String password)
      Validates the user's login credentials against the user database.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address.
      password - the user's password.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.

    • getLoggedInUser

      Returns:

    • updateProfile

      public void updateProfile(Profile userProfile)
      This method updates the user profile by saving the user input to the database and calculating BMR, TDEE, fat, carbohydrates, and protein.
      Parameters:
      userProfile - - The user profile object containing the user's input.
